title: How to Use the IconSVG Component
description: This guide covers the main use cases and setup for the IconSVG component, which allows rendering SVG icons dynamically in React.
author: Documentation Team

blocks.content: The IconSVG component can be used in various scenarios, including:

Rendering SVG icons from external URLs.
Customizing the size of the icons using width and height props.
Adding alternative text for accessibility using the alt prop.
Applying custom CSS classes to the icons using the className prop.
